languages.text: Вольный Торговец приказал{mf||а} истреблять беженцев из Сципионы 84-249. Множество беглецов, которые проскользнули в иные города-ульи, поклялись отомстить за эту расправу.
The Rogue Trader ordered that the refugees from Scipione 84-249 be exterminated. Having sworn an oath of vengeance for this massacre, scores of fugitives escaped to other hive cities.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец приказал{mf||а} истреблять беженцев из Сципионы 84-249. Множество беглецов, которые проскользнули в иные города-ульи, поклялись отомстить за эту расправу.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader ordered to have refugees from Scipione 84-249 exterminated. Having sworn an oath of vengeance for this massacre, scores of fugitives escaped to other hive cities.
The Rogue Trader ordered to have refugees from Scipione 84-249 exterminated. Having sworn an oath of vengeance for this massacre, scores of fugitives escaped to other hive cities.
The Rogue Trader ordered that the refugees from Scipione 84-249 be exterminated. Having sworn an oath of vengeance for this massacre, scores of fugitives escaped to other hive cities.
The Rogue Trader ordered to have refugees from Scipione 84-249 exterminated, and now {mf|his|her} subjects are forced to deal with scores of vengeful fugitives who have escaped to other hive cities.
The Rogue Trader ordered that the refugees from Scipione 84-249 be exterminated. Having sworn an oath of vengeance for this massacre, scores of fugitives escaped to other hive cities.
The Rogue Trader ordered that the refugees from Scipione 84-249 be exterminated. Having sworn an oath of vengeance for this massacre, scores of fugitives escaped to other hive cities.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a ordonné l'extermination des réfugiés de Scipione 84-249. Bien décidés à se venger de ce massacre, de très nombreux fugitifs sont parvenus à s'enfuir vers d'autres cités-ruches.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered that the refugees from Scipione 84-249 be exterminated. Having sworn an oath of vengeance for this massacre, scores of fugitives escaped to other hive cities.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a ordonné l'extermination des réfugiés de Scipione 84-249. Bien décidés à se venger de ce massacre, de très nombreux fugitifs sont parvenus à s'enfuir vers d'autres cités-ruches.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーは、Scipione84-249からの難民を絶滅させるよう命じた。この大虐殺への復讐を誓い、数多くの逃亡者が他のハイブ都市に逃亡した。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered that the refugees from Scipione 84-249 be exterminated. Having sworn an oath of vengeance for this massacre, scores of fugitives escaped to other hive cities.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーは、Scipione84-249からの難民を絶滅させるよう命じた。この大虐殺への復讐を誓い、数多くの逃亡者が他のハイブ都市に逃亡した。

languages.text: 行商浪人下令彻底消灭来自希皮奥内84-249号的难民。其中几十名难民在混乱中逃往其他巢都，发誓要向这场大屠杀的幕后黑手复仇。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered that the refugees from Scipione 84-249 be exterminated. Having sworn an oath of vengeance for this massacre, scores of fugitives escaped to other hive cities.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人下令彻底消灭来自希皮奥内84-249号的难民。其中几十名难民在混乱中逃往其他巢都，发誓要向这场大屠杀的幕后黑手复仇。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordenó el exterminio de los refugiados de Scipione 84-249. Jurando venganza por la masacre, los fugitivos huyeron por docenas a otras ciudades colmena.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered that the refugees from Scipione 84-249 be exterminated. Having sworn an oath of vengeance for this massacre, scores of fugitives escaped to other hive cities.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordenó el exterminio de los refugiados de Scipione 84-249. Jurando venganza por la masacre, los fugitivos huyeron por docenas a otras ciudades colmena.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ordnete an, die Flüchtlinge aus Scipione 84-249 zu töten. Unzählige Flüchtlinge schworen Rache für dieses Massaker und flüchteten in andere Makropolen.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered that the refugees from Scipione 84-249 be exterminated. Having sworn an oath of vengeance for this massacre, scores of fugitives escaped to other hive cities.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ordnete an, die Flüchtlinge aus Scipione 84-249 zu töten. Unzählige Flüchtlinge schworen Rache für dieses Massaker und flüchteten in andere Makropolen.
